metadata.name: Celebrity Sugar Skulls - Marilyn
metadata.description:
Tribute to Marilyn

"A wise girl knows her limits, a smart girl knows that she has none."  
Marilyn Monroe

1/1  
2048x2048  
PNG

The Day of the Dead (Spanish: Día de Muertos or Día de los Muertos) is a joyful time that helps people remember the deceased and celebrate their memory.

Infamy survives long after physical death. Here are the incredible and memorable deceased who illuminate and shine on in the darkness of mortality, they are our stars. From Frida to Janis, Bob to Elvis, Marilyn to Lucille, This NFT tribute presents a gallery of immortal and influential celebrities who have defined numerous generations. Each skull is adorned with the likeness, and personal spirit with vibrancy and characteristics of their incredible lives. Quite often tragic but always remembered with magic, these aren't just sugar skulls, they're a tribute to famous and incredible people who are remembered throughout time.
